title: Help me find this typeface?
content:
This font is gorgeous, but I don't know what it is called! Any help? You will have my undying gratitude :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414215947/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_120.png) | 168.47 KB |
author: eviekitten1

comments.content:
May be you find something like it around here:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Asansserif+tag%3Ageometric+tag%3Abauh...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414215947/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Asansserif+tag%3Ageometric+tag%3Abauhaus+-tag%3Amonitor/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3Asansserif+tag%3Ageometric+tag%3Abauhaus+-tag%3Amonitor/fonts/")

And according to forum structure your thread might have more success in here:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414215947/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

best regards
Thanks for the suggestion, I will try that now.
